name: AVCapturePhotoBracketSettings
desc: A specification of the features and settings to use for a photo capture request that captures multiple images with varied settings.

items.name: init(rawPixelFormatType: OSType, rawFileType: AVFileType?, processedFormat: [String : Any]?, processedFileType: AVFileType?, bracketedSettings: [AVCaptureBracketedStillImageSettings])
items.desc: Creates a photo settings object for capture in both RAW format and a processed format.

items.name: init(rawPixelFormatType: OSType, processedFormat: [String : Any]?, bracketedSettings: [AVCaptureBracketedStillImageSettings])
items.desc: Creates a photo settings object for the specified bracket of captures, in the specified formats.

items.name: var bracketedSettings: [AVCaptureBracketedStillImageSettings]
items.desc: An array describing the number of and settings for images to produce in a bracketed capture.

items.name: var isLensStabilizationEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether to stabilize the lens for the duration of the bracketed capture.

items.name: class AVCaptureAutoExposureBracketedStillImageSettings
items.desc: A configuration for defining bracketed photo captures in terms of bias relative to automatic exposure.

items.name: class AVCaptureManualExposureBracketedStillImageSettings
items.desc: A configuration for defining bracketed photo captures in terms of specific exposure and ISO values.

items.name: class AVCaptureBracketedStillImageSettings
items.desc: The abstract superclass for bracketed photo capture settings.
